sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card color="gray" width="100%"  flat outlined class="_root" >
    <v-card width="100%" flat >
        <v-row class="mx-6" no-gutters >
            <v-card width="240" height="160" flat class="ma-4" v-for="i in 50" :key="i" clipped>
                <v-img :src="imgs" @mouseover="hovering = true" @mouseleave="hovering = false">
                </v-img>
                <v-fade-transition>
                <v-overlay
                        v-if="hovering === true"
                        absolute
                        color="#036358"
                        z-index="1000"
                    >
                        <v-btn>See more info</v-btn>
                    </v-overlay>
                </v-fade-transition>
                <v-card-title class="text-body-1 pa-0 my-2">{{imgs}}</v-card-title>
            </v-card>
        </v-row>
    </v-card>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'GalleryItem',
    data() {
        return {
            imgs: require('../assets/scene00001.png'),
            zoom: require('../assets/zoom-in.png'),
            hovering: false,
        }
    },
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
